text: Satoru Nakajima (Japanese name: 中嶋 悟 ; born February 23, 1953) is a Japanese professional athlete. He is best known as a racecar driver.DriverDatabase.com, Satoru; retrieved 2012-7-22. He is the father of two sons who are also racecar drivers. Kazuki NakajimaDriverDatabase.com, Kazuki Nakajima; retrieved 2012-7-22. and Daisuke NakajimaDriverDatabase.com, Daisuke Nakajima; retrieved 2012-7-22. are each Formula One competitors. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Aichi Prefecture
title: Satoru Nakajima
